action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi team,

We have an upcoming promotion for International Women's Day, which runs from 3rd March - 14th March 2025.

Can we do a banner takeover on both Stella AU homepage & /car-insurance page during those days? We will also need to add the promotional T&Cs in the footer on those 2 pages only.

Style is similar to the Black Friday promo that we did in November.


* IWD promo banner asset is on Canva here: https://www.canva.com/design/DAF0MDgEvN8/zYkSU22PlXKkSVp7SnyJRg/edit?utm_content=DAF0MDgEvN8&utm_campaign=designshare&utm_medium=link2&utm_source=sharebutton

(banner takeover - on Stella AU homepage and /car-insurance page)


* Banner click through link is: https://app.stellainsurance.com.au/product/stella_pr_motor_asu/comprehensive?voucherCode=AF8CACA6318B49BC
(promo code is embedded)

* Promotional disclaimer: See wording attached. We want it to sit above the existing Brand disclaimer as an additional element on those 2 pages during the promo period.



Are you able to create the banner + disclaimer on a separate hidden page for preview by Monday morning please?



Thanks a lot,
Vivian

Vivian Yeung
Senior Marketing Manager

m 0481 362 848
e vivian@stellainsurance.com.au<mailto:vivian@stellainsurance.com.au>
w stellainsurance.com.au
